description: This sprint focuses on enhancing the user experience and adding new search features.

userStories.title: Improve Search Autocomplete
userStories.userStory: As a user, I want the search autocomplete to suggest relevant terms so that I can quickly find what I'm looking for.
userStories.description: Enhance the search bar's autocomplete feature to provide more relevant and diverse suggestions.
acceptanceCriteria: Autocomplete suggestions appear after typing 3 characters.
No more than 10 suggestions are shown at once.
notes: Use machine learning for better prediction.

userStories.title: Add Search Filters
userStories.userStory: As a user, I want to filter search results by category so that I can narrow down my search.
userStories.description: Provide filtering options in the search results page to allow users to refine their search by categories.
acceptanceCriteria: Filters are visible on the search results page.
Multiple filters can be applied at once.
Results update instantly after applying filters.
notes: Consider adding a 'clear all filters' option.
